outputs.output_descr: This project aims at supporting environment programme formulation and approval, developping Iona Conservation National Biodiversity project document and supporting the Okavango River Basin closure plan mainly finalization of Transboundary Diagnosis Analysis (TDA) and the Strategic Action Programme (SAP).

project_descr: UNDP support to the Okavango River Basin Programme, support to Environment Programme formulation and approval and support to Iona Conservation Initiation Plan.
